alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 11:16PM CDT until November 04 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LONOKE...EAST CENTRAL SALINE AND SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1115 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Wrightsville, or 10 miles southeast of Southwest Little Rock, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Wrightsville... East End... Protho Junction... Sweet Home... Ironton... Estes... McAlmont... Toltec Mounds State Park... Scott... Baucum... Higgins... Willow Beach... Toltec... College Station... Rose City... Parkers-Iron Springs... TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
